id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

updated_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the campaign was last updated.

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the campaign was created.

name.description: The name assigned to the campaign for easy identification.

ad_account_id.description: The unique identifier of the advertising account associated with the campaign.

status.description: The current status of the campaign (e.g., paused, active).

objective.description: The primary goal or objective of the campaign.

start_time.description: The starting date and time for the campaign to begin running.

buy_model.description: The purchasing model used for the campaign (e.g., auction, reach and frequency).

creation_state.description: The current state of the campaign creation process.
